search.query: `sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" | stats values(user) by Computer

`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" user!="*SA_SecurityCenterBO" EventCode=1 | rex field=Image "[\\\/](?<filename>[^\\\/]*)$" | lookup tools.csv filename OUTPUT discovery_or_attack | table filename, discovery_or_attack, User, Computer | where discovery_or_attack!=""

`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*\\certutil.exe" OR Image="*\\powershell.exe" OR Image="*\\msbuild.exe" OR Image="*\\psexec.exe" OR Image="*\\at.exe" OR Image="*\\schtasks.exe" OR Image="*\\net.exe" OR Image="*\\vssadmin.exe" OR Image="*\\utilman.exe" OR Image="*\\wmic.exe" OR Image="*\\mshta.exe" OR Image="*\\wscript.exe" OR Image="*\\cscript.exe" OR Image="*\\cmd.exe" OR Image="*\\whoami.exe" OR Image="*\\mmc.exe" OR Image="*\\systeminfo.exe" OR Image="*\\csvde.exe" | stats count by Image, ParentImage, user | sort-count

`sysmon` EventCode=1 host="*$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*$app$" Hashes="*$hash$*" | rex field=Image "[\\\/](?<filename>[^\\\/]*)$" | eval filename=lower(filename)| stats dc(filename) as NumFilenames values(filename) as Filenames values(Image) as Images by MD5,SHA256 |where NumFilenames>1
`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*$app$" Hashes="*$hash$*" | stats count by Image,user,MD5,SHA256,Computer | sort-count
`sysmon` EventCode=8 host="$host$" user="*$user$" SourceImage=*temp* OR SourceImage="C:\\ProgramData\\*" OR SourceImage="C:\\Users\\*" | eval ppid=SourceImage+";"+TargetImage
`sysmon` EventCode=1 host="$host$" user="*$user$" | rex field=Image "(?<filename>[^\\\]+)$" | eval file_length=len(filename) | where file_length < 6 | table Image, filename, Computer
`sysmon` EventCode=8 host="$host$" user="*$user$" TargetImage="C:\\Windows\\System32\\svchost.exe" | eval ppid=SourceImage+";"+TargetImage | rare ppid

`sysmon` EventCode=1 host="$host$" user="*$user$" (Image="*\cmd.exe" OR Image="*\powershell.exe" OR Image="*\wscript.exe" OR Image="*\certutil.exe") AND (ParentImage="*\WINWORD.exe" OR ParentImage="*\EXCEL.exe" OR ParentImage="*\PowerPNT.exe")

'sysmon' host="$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*\\net.exe" (CommandLine="*net group*" OR CommandLine="*net localgroup*" OR CommandLine="*net user" OR CommandLine="*net view") | stats count by Computer,CommandLine, User

`sysmon` EventCode=1 host="$host$" user="*$user$" | rex field=Image "[\\\/](?<filename>[^\\\/]*)$" | eval filename=lower(filename)| stats dc(filename) as NumFilenames values(filename) as Filenames values(Image) as Images by Hashes |where NumFilenames>1

table.title: New scheduled task created via CLI

search.query: 'sysmon' host="$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*\\schtasks.exe" (CommandLine="*/Create*" CommandLine="*/s *" OR CommandLine="*/Run*" CommandLine="*/s *" OR CommandLine="*/Delete*" CommandLine="*/s *" OR CommandLine="*/Change*" CommandLine="*/s *") | stats count by Computer,CommandLine,user
`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" wmic.exe NOT management_use_1 â€¦ NOT management_use_2 NOT management_use_3
`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" ParentImage="*\\WmiPrvSE.exe" | stats count by Computer,user ,CommandLine

`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" CommandLine="*privileges::debug*" OR CommandLine="*sekurlsa::*" OR CommandLine="*kerberos::*" OR CommandLine="*crypto::*" OR CommandLine="*lsadump::*" OR CommandLine="*process::*"
`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" powershell.exe Invoke* OR IEX OR Download* | table _time, Computer, ProcessId, Image,CommandLine, ParentProcessId,ParentImage,ParentCommandLine

`sysmon` host="$host$" user="*$user$" Image="*$app$" Hashes="*$hash$*" [ search sourcetype="xmlwineventlog:microsoft-windows-sysmon/operational" EventDescription="File Create Time" | streamstats time_window=1m count(EventDescription) AS "new_files" | search new_files>10 | fields + Image ] | stats last(Image) as File by _time, ParentCommandLine,Hashes
